name: Blood & Beans
description:
This is our take on #GGJ17 - "waves" of customers

Stock shelves, troll customers by moving what they want about, and kill them off if you so fancy.

Your goal is to last as long as you can in the endless struggle that is your job, make sure neither yourself nor your customers become too enraged, else you'll be canned; bean canned. #arcade

Made for Global Game Jam 2017

Find this on GameJolt.
